local_intent: Detect block and goal, move above the block with 2 cm clearance, then verify visibility of the block.
assumptions: Block and goal are visible to the camera
coherence_with_global: Implements the early approach phase of the GLOBAL_BT: detect T_block and T_goal, move above T_block (offset_z=0.02, timeout_ms=800), and verify with visibility before subsequent yaw/contact steps.
